alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Searcy, northeastern Newton and southwestern Marion Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Duff, or 12 miles northwest of Marshall, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Grove... Duff... Point Peter... St. Joe... Pindall... Gilbert... Bass... Yardelle... Silver Hill... Woolum Recreation Area... Baker Ford... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations
